General.Name: Industri Dan Perdagangan Bintraco Dharma Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Industri dan Perdagangan Bintraco Dharma Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in automotive sales and after sales services, and financing businesses in Indonesia. It operates through Automotive, Financing, and After Sales segments. The company sells motor vehicles; and offers sales and after-sales services, as well as provides financing services. It is also involved in the trading or distribution of spare parts and services; maintenance of repair shop networks under the CARfix brand; trading and property, and services business; building rental; provision of vehicle repair services; and vehicle dealing. In addition, the company operates CARSWORLD, a car ecosystem platform. PT Industri dan Perdagangan Bintraco Dharma Tbk was incorporated in 1969 and is headquartered in Tangerang Selatan, Indonesia.
General.Address: Gedung CARSWORLD Lantai 8, Tangerang Selatan, Indonesia, 15321
